tool_description: Manages vendor approval workflow routing based on risk assessment, dollar thresholds, and organizational hierarchy with automated notifications and tracking.

risk_rating.description: Vendor risk rating (low, medium, high, critical)

estimated_annual_spend.description: Estimated annual spending with vendor in USD

bypass_standard_workflow.description: Whether to bypass standard workflow for emergency cases

approver_override.description: Specific approver to route to (overrides automatic routing)

auto_approve_threshold.description: Threshold below which approval is automatic for low-risk vendors

error_messages: Invalid risk rating: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [normal, expedited, emergency].
Estimated spend invalid: Must be a positive number representing annual spend in USD.
Approver not found: Specified approver_override user does not exist in the system.
Workflow routing failed: Unable to determine appropriate approval workflow based on provided parameters.
Emergency bypass unauthorized: Current user lacks permission to bypass standard workflow.
Invalid notification method: Use valid notification methods from [email, sms, slack, teams].
Auto-approve threshold exceeded: Vendor exceeds auto-approval threshold and requires manual review.
Department not recognized: Requesting department must be a valid organizational unit.
usage: Provide vendor_id, risk_rating, and estimated_annual_spend. Optionally configure urgency_level, requesting_department, special_requirements, and review flags. The tool routes approval request through appropriate workflow.

workflow_id.description: Unique identifier for the approval workflow instance

approval_status.description: Current approval status (pending, approved, rejected, in_review)

approval_route.description: List of approvers in the workflow sequence

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion date for approval process

next_action_required.description: Description of the next required action
